messages.title: A MESSAGE FROM DAVID JONES
messages.content: This is the most important general election of any of our lifetimes. In June 2016, the people of this country voted by a clear majority to leave the European Union. Politics had to follow the instructions. That is what we are doing, but failed to do so. That is why we now have an election in December to break open a Parliament that will not provide one.

messages.title: David Jones, your local Conservative candidate
messages.content: David is a local person, having lived in this area since 1979. Born in London of Welsh parents, David was brought up in the Welsh tradition and speaks fluent Welsh. He became a solicitor in Ruthin. Post-qualification, he became a partner in a legal practice in Llandudno.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure that, after Brexit, Clwyd West will have a strong and effective local MP for years to come.

issues.brexitEurope: Ensure that after Brexit, Clwyd West will have a strong and effective local MP for years to come.

leaflet.personalStatement: This election is possibly the most important general election of any of our lifetimes. It provides the people of Clwyd West the opportunity to elect a strong voice to represent them in Parliament.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for Clwyd West
politicalExperience.achievements: He was appointed as Minister of State at the Department for Exiting the European Union.

images.caption: David Jones with party leader Boris Johnson
David Jones speaking with a constituent

leaflet.additionalNotes: David is committed to Welsh issues, the politics of immigration control and photography.
